headline: The AES Corporation (AES) Reinforces 2025 Outlook with Amazon Solar Mega-Project Milestone
summary: The AES Corporation (NYSE:AES), a global power generation and utility company, owns and operates a generation portfolio of over 32,109 megawatts, distributing power to 2.7 million customers. AES is one of the 7 52-Week Low Dividend Stocks to Consider. On June 11, 2025, The AES Corporation (NYSE:AES) announced the successful completion of Phase 1 of […]

headline: The AES Corporation (AES): Among the Energy Stocks that Fell This Week
summary: The share price of The AES Corporation (NYSE:AES) fell by 6.73% between June 10 and June 17, 2025, putting it among the Energy Stocks that Lost the Most This Week. The AES Corporation (NYSE:AES), together with its subsidiaries, operates as a power generation and utility company in the United States and internationally. The AES Corporation […]
